title: Iron in Australia
brief_description: An instructional film surveying the iron industry in Australia. Shows the mining of iron ore; the processing procedure, using explanatory animated drawings; and the manufacture of iron and steel products. Includes a brief history of the industry in Australia. Commentary by Roger Climpson.
